Author: bartwr#6773
Content:
@TonyL Question:

https://www.atomicexplorer.com:9998/api/getbalance?port=10000&ip=electrum1.cipig.net&proto=tcp&address=KOMODO_ADDRESS does not work. This because of the fact that `blockchain.address.get_balance` is removed. https://electrumx.readthedocs.io/en/latest/protocol-removed.html#blockchain.address.get_balance It should be replaced with ` blockchain.scripthash.get_balance`. You know this already of course. Is there something I can do to help? Can I update https://github.com/pbca26/electrum-proxy ?

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
Hmm, as I can see in code already presists need validation and for electrums v.1.4 should be used not-depreacted method:
 https://github.com/pbca26/electrum-proxy/blob/master/routes/electrum/electrumjs.core.js#L315

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: This fix was added on Apr 11: https://github.com/pbca26/electrum-proxy/commit/11a4ceb29b24aa7abd5dac7f2b618d59cfe2b7c8#diff-720f9673510bd6a784e226f352d9bfe1

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: So maybe atomcexplorer.com:9998 using not up-to-date version of code @bartwr

Author: bartwr#6773
Content: I think that's ^ the case. Do you know an other, trusted URL? Otherwise I'll run my own

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: To be honest I'm not sure. Maybe @cipi can advise on this matter

Author: bartwr#6773
Content: Ok, thanks üòÉ

Author: bartwr#6773
Content: atomicexplorer:9998 is indeed using an old version of https://github.com/pbca26/electrum-proxy. I'm now installing an own version, to have full control.

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: Atomic explorer is maintained and created by pbca FYI

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: It's extremely helpful

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: More like one of those people, it's mainly pbca

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: hello

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: i have a question

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: my mobile phone is dead and want to get my agama wallet with my kmd on my laptop

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: the problem is that i already downloaded the agama wallet and restored it but the balance is still zero

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: can anybody help me with that?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: which desktop version you are using?

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: i had an android wallet on my mobile phone and a desktop wallet on my laptop

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: which desktop version you are using?

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: i have a agama desktop wallet (v0.3.6b-beta)

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: is your Proxy settings enabled? if yes, please disable it, save settings and restart Agama. check this guide https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000029569-how-to-stop-agama-from-using-a-proxy-server-to-access-electrum-servers

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: going to check that now

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: it was already not enabled

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: what address do you see on Agama lite mode? please post the address

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: does the address match with the one you had funds in?

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: a different adres than my adres where my funds are in

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: then, you have used wrong seed

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: use the right seed, which will unlock your right address and you will be able to see your balance

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: check this guide https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000027661-why-am-not-seeing-the-same-address-when-i-login-

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: i filled in my seed without space

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: maybe that was the problem?

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: gonne try it again

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: yes, you need to have the right spaces in between the words, if you had them originally

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: if you remove a space, that changes the seed

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: holy shit

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: didnt know that and was thinking, if it says it is the right seed than it must be mine

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: agama will accept any seed, words, numbers, string and will generate a corresponding address.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: same seed will always generate same address

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: thank you very much!!!

Author: Nikko92#0428
Content: it worked

Content: Biggest Respect to @SHossain for the support here and all others !! üëçüèªüëçüèª

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: Thanks @Acura

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: @bobo Komodo doesn't have testnet

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: (please ask same question in only in one channel)

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: you can create any assetchain and test mining with `komodod`

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: `./komodo-cli -ac_name=BOBO -ac_supply=0 -ac_reward=25600000000 -testnode=1` will create an assetchain called BOBO with mining reward of 256 each block

Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
you can learn more here
https://developers.komodoplatform.com/
